title: Dell XPS 15 - BIOS & Overheating
summary: Managing thermal profiles and updating BIOS.
content:
Fan noise/Heat: Open 'Dell Power Manager'. Set Thermal Management to 'Quiet' or 'Cool'. 

BIOS Update: Ensure battery is >10%. Download .exe from Dell Support. 
Force Shutdown: Hold power button for 25 seconds to drain flea power.
